63,Navigate to Samsung Category and Verify Home Page,"Navigate to the home page, select the Samsung category, return to home, and verify that the home page is displayed.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link samsung -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 3: Click on link byTitle
Step 4: Click on link phoneSupport -> Navigate to page ''
Step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High
64,Order Accessories and Verify Home Page,Navigate to home, select accessories, place an order for a USB-C adapter, and verify the home page after checkout.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link accessories -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 3: Click on link byTitle
Step 4: Click on button sale20WusbtypeCadapter
Step 5: Click on link placeAnOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 6: Click on button increased
Step 7: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
Step 8: Click on input email
Step 9: Enter input value in input email
Step 10: Click on button continueToShipping -> Navigate to page ''
Step 11: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High

Step 5: Fill in shipping details and proceed to payment section
